channel.title: Freizeit on Vacation in Hirschberg
channel.description: Recent content in Freizeit on Vacation in Hirschberg

item.title: Hiking
item.description: Hiking in and around Hirschberg Due to its location in the heart of the Arnsberg forest, Hirschberg offers numerous hiking opportunities. In addition to the Sauerland Waldroute, there are 192km of marked hiking trails around Hirschberg.
